segments.text: I notice the boy is really stretching to reach those cookies, and the stool looks like it's about to tip.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl seems to trust her brother completely, standing there with her hand out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is so oblivious, just drying that plate like nothing else matters.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe she hasn't noticed the water all over the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is just pouring water, and it's spreading everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so nice, it's a shame they're missing it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the boy will fall or if the woman will finally turn around.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl looks so hopeful, like those cookies are the best thing ever.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like yelling at them to be careful, but I don't think they'd hear me.
segments.speaker: PAR
